data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of North Garo Hills, Meghalaya, India will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of North Garo Hills, Meghalaya, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of North Garo Hills, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of North Garo Hills that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: the county of North Garo Hills has (about) 400 people who know Jesus, 442 people who know about him culturally, and 35,558 people who are far from Jesus.
Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Sabar people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in North Garo Hills, Meghalaya, India to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in North Garo Hills, Meghalaya, India to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 400 believers in North Garo Hills.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

location.name: North Garo Hills
location.people_groups_list: Koch (Hindu traditions), Bhunar, Koch (Muslim traditions), Bonaj, Halam
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Koch (Hindu traditions) (50,000), Bhunar (200), Koch (Muslim traditions) (400), Bonaj (400), Halam (42,000)
